barks.bark: Greetings!
Welcome to the bank!
Thank you for choosing the bank!

exitdialoguebarks.bark: Thank you for banking with us!
Thank you for banking with us!

npc.name: Marzin Stonefort, the Mayor of Haywind

barks.bark: Your friends are waiting for you upstairs, Master Aercrest!
Ugh, can you believe those two?!
Before you ask, I don't work for free.
Amronn... mennech... asra... ash... astaril?
Curse it, can never quite remember these incantations correctly.
But I'll be flogged before I let the others see me ask Master Varrange for help again...
C'mon Brianna, what was it... 'ashrandil'?
Keep your nerves calm and you wits about you, young Weatherwitch...
And stick close to us, we won't let anything befall you.
Thank you for your soothing words, Anhring, I shall take heed of them...
You're an excellent mage, Brianna, trust in your instincts.
They will guide you through any battle.
Of course, as you say Gendaril...
Hah, you gave him right what he deserved!
Now please, help me get out of here!
Bloody Hubert...
Should'a built that crossbow, like I was plannin' to...
Could'a shot Hubert right in the crotch...
No loitering!
Darn rats...
Rent a horse, sir?
Only nutters wanna go into the deep swamp, if you ask me...
But s'ppose I'll get you there anyway, if it's what you want.
C'mon now, Anders - you really mean to leave me hanging here?
Aghhhhhh...
Surely this can't be the first time you've been bit by those things?
Never so much before...
How about you hop onto the boat and ferry me over, take your mind off it you know?
Can't... even... argh...!
Anders... pleaaase...?
Hey, you there - I recognize you!
I want to thank you, for what you did for me!
Undead, undead everywhere...
What is a man supposed to do...?

npc.name: Brother Augustus, Priest of the Sleeping Souls

barks.bark: Welcome to my Shrine, traveling soul!
Ah, there you are, adventurous soul!
May benevolent spirits always watch over you, Champion of the Dead!

npc.name: Deer
npc.comment: for hunting quest, runs away from player

barks.bark: Drinking again, my lord?
It's only morning, m'lord...
There you are!
Mourrr...?
Good kitty, Furrball!
Purrr!
You know, the only truly important thing in life is gardening...
And even that's not so important.
I don't take kindly to your kind around here.
Helga is a witch, mark my words.
Urgh...!
Bleurgh...

npc.name: Villager
npc.comment: Grainwater bride quest happy option, Timberwell

npc.name: Villager
npc.comment: Grainwater bride quest oke option, Timberwell

npc.name: Villager
npc.comment: Grainwater bride quest fail option, Timberwell

barks.bark: *whistles to himself out of tune*
This place feels a bit off, don't you think? Have you seen that shady character upstairs?
Well, every inn has its share of odd folks. We're just here for the night.
I suppose, but it doesn't make me feel any better. What if she's a... thief, or something even worse?
Look, if it makes you feel better, I'll talk to the innkeeper about it. But let's not jump to conclusions.
As long as you promise to be cautious. I don't want any trouble the guest upstairs.
Miners like to complain injuries, I say they're just lazy.

npc.name: Rane Mercoss, the Mercenary Captain
npc.comment: Q111 ally, initially at haywind mountain pass

barks.bark: Once the day is done, everyone will speak of Mercoss warriors.
Yes, boss.
Cleave the enemy hard, show no mercy!
Yes, boss!
There is glory to be had on the field today, seize it!
Aye, boss.
This land will not soon forget the way Mercoss Band fought against the bandit horde!
Look around you, do the others here seem like half the warriors we are?
No, boss.
No they do not, we know they're not.
This day is a chance to display the might of real warriors - our might!
Of course, boss!
Are you ready to meet your destiny?
The sun, the moon and the stars know you - they love you!

aggrobarks.bark: We don't take kindly to your kind 'round here...!

barks.bark: How many times must I say, Zathe?
If you mean to enjoy ale in my tavern, I expect you leave that battlegear at home!
My apologies, madam Barnsmill, it's been a long day.
And I fear it may yet become longer still...

npc.name: Villager
npc.comment: broken cart dude questgiver in grainwater

barks.bark: Not much to do about a broken cart...
Wooohooo!
Keep the flute going, Tom!
Yes yes, oh yay!
You lot make me feel young again!
Time to pop open a new cask, eh lads?!
YES!
WOO!
Hahhaaa!
Thash right... keep the... shtuff flowing, Amelia!
Yeah not for you, though, Greyson!
It's about time you douse yourself in the cold river waters!
Wha...shh...?
WOO!
Yeah, come back when your head's clearer, alright?
Un...fair...
Fresh fish on sale, fresh fish!

npc.name: Alyssa Stonepond, the Ghost of Greywall

barks.bark: *UNINTELLIGIBLE WHISPERS*

combatbarks.bark: ALL WILL FEEL MY FURY...
MY RAGE IS BOUNDLESS...
SUFFER, LIKE I SUFFERED...
THEY DESERVE THEIR TORMENT...
VENGEANCE, DELIVERED IN A WHISPER...

bestiarynotes.note: The ghost switches her attacks between ranged and magical damage. I could try to use ampoules to negate her more powerful attacks.

npc.name: Drawyn Spear, the Warden of Greywall

barks.bark: WHO'S LAUGHING?!
WHY DO I HEAR LAUGHTER?!
IT'S NOT ALLOWED WITHIN THESE WALLS, I FORBID IT!!!
Did you think me so stupid...
That I wouldn't see through it?!
NOBODY LAUGHS AT DRAWYN SPEAR, NO ONE!!!
STOP... LAUGHING!!!
STOP IT!!!
I will wipe all your smiles...
I WILL NOT BE DISRESPECTED!!!

combatbarks.bark: You seek to mock me, don't you...?!
NOBODY LAUGHS AT DRAWYN SPEAR, NO ONE!!!
I'LL FLAY YOU ALIVE!!!
YOU WILL COME TO REGRET YOUR INSOLENCE!!!
Let's see if regular beatings will change your tone...!

aggrobarks.bark: YOUR INSOLENCE WILL NOT GO UNPUNISHED!!!

bestiarynotes.note: The Warden becomes enraged mid fight, temporarily increasing his damage.
The Warden summons his cleaver and cane to support him, the cane will try to heal him.

barks.bark: Books, books, books...
Is all about them books...
Good books, bad books...
All sorts of books...
But stay away from bad books, stay away...
Fine swords, purchase yourself a fine sword!
Never know what you might encounter in the mines, a... goblin, maybe?
You'll be wanting a sword then!
...don't be scarin' the fish away now...

npc.name: Servant
npc.comment: prologue manor, next to banquet hall door

npc.name: Militia Lieutenant
npc.comment: west hw bandito village, gives warning

barks.bark: Woof...!
Woof, woof..!
Grrr...!

npc.name: Lumberjack
npc.comment: in front of storm mess blocking off road to mistywoods before Q61

npc.name: Farmer
npc.comment: 4,5 smol village, female - Ashenside Fields Acres Achievements Farmer

barks.bark: There have been rumors... Kingdom of Melloria might be marching south again.
Another war?! Surely they cannot afford it!
It's the way winds are blowing. There's been trouble with the Morie Hill tribes.
I thought Morie Tribes had a treaty of sorts with the Kingdom, what's changed?
Who knows? Some say it might all be a ruse for the King to finally expand his realm south.
If true, it might turn into quite the prolonged campaign...

npc.name: Traveling Mage
npc.comment: sells Mistywoods tps in Fogs Dwindling

npc.name: Skeletal Sorcerer
npc.comment: uses gale and ember, hits up to 18

npc.name: Ancient Undead
npc.comment: etherlight dungeon, uses gale and ember, hits up to 18

npc.name: Sergeant Malborn
npc.comment: At south gate, talks in C110

barks.bark: Weary of carrying around your valuables?
Can store them for yeh.
Only one in this place who can...

npc.name: Gabrius, Master of The Black Grimoire

barks.bark: Seekin' a ride out?
Hop in, plannin' to make the trip in just a bit.

npc.name: Giant Tentacle of the Fen Devourer
Eloria Mirvren
npc.comment: follower in cave before final boss battle

barks.bark: Sure, it ain't quite like some fancy shops in big cities...
But I have all the necessities, and hauling 'em over to this swamp's worth a penny by itself.

npc.name: Food Vendor
npc.comment: thornhill south gate next to gen store

barks.bark: Eat it before it goes bad! Food for sale!
Hungry? Come get your grub here.
It's not gourmet, but it'll fill your belly.
Food for the masses, because who has time for fancy cuisine?
Come and get it, if you can stomach it.

npc.name: Madam Hubbs
npc.comment: quest giver lady in Ratcliffe village

barks.bark: Help me, somebody please help me!
Sir, you look like someone who can help, please!
Please, let my husband Thomas be alright...
Don't you scare me like that again, though.
I was worried sick you might have had yourself killed!
Can't strike it rich without finding new veins...
And what good are riches if you're dead?
S'pose you have a point there...

npc.name: Apprentice Fiona
npc.comment: Starts plague doctor quest, Fiona Shark

barks.bark: Step right up and get lucky with these enchanted charms!
Find the riches you've been searching for with our magical trinkets!
Experience the power of good luck with our special items - you won't be disappointed!
Don't let fate pass you by - take control with our mystical accessories!

combatbarks.bark: I own you!
Gonna cry?
Hahaha!

barks.bark: LITTLE DEVILS!! You must stop this at once!
Hahahahaha!
Laaalalalala!
Your parents will hear about this!
cRaAaNkY aAaDaMs, cRaAaNkY aAaDaMs!
He sooo mad!
Why so mad, mister? Haha!
You little brats, you're gonna be in so much trouble!
You're a CraAaNkY aAaDaMs!
Lalalalalalala!
AaaAAAAAAaaaaAAAAAAaaaa!!
I've just about had it with you!
I've just about had it with rowdy kids!
This used to be a pleasant, quiet neighborhood.
This is it...?
My pride and joy!
Well...!
If the river bandits don't get us, maybe this barge will...
Over here, my friend!
Pour me another ale, woman!
I will not!
You what?! You better start pouring!
You get too mean when you drink!
I'm not having it!
She right, Will - take a break.
Eh?! You think you can tell me what to do?!
An' just what're you lookin' at?!
I'm bored...
Parents are boring, no fun allowed...
Well I'm hungry...
Heavens, me too!
Wish we had some berry pie...
Oh I love pie, mmm... sweet berry pie!
You guys get in massive trouble with your parents?
Yeah...
Yeah, me too...
Yeah... me too, me too...
Pie was worth it though.
Mmmm...! Totally!
So, am I still the best fisherman around or what?
Gotta say, you done it again, Gilles!
Just wow!
I mean, look at the scales on that thing!
Yeah, well look at the size!
That's right, I did this. Hehe!
...fishing level?
How will you ever top this next time?
I'll just have to catch a bigger one, won't I?
Nice...
hi
hello
do u have a moment
hey
sup
If you ask me, he never really deserved to win any fishing competition.
Hrm...?
Gilles, I mean - talkin' about Gilles.
Hrm...
Don't understand why folk get so excited, if you think about it...
Mmhh...
Gilles is just a showoff, a man who likes attention, you know?
I don't know, I think folk should try to ignore him mostly.
...think you should focus more on fishing and less on Gilles, Raymond...
What's that?
Hrm...?
How many boats need to be trashed, how many nets broken…
...until you people learn to respect the legends?!
There’s real danger out there - of course, I speak of The Great Mudclaw!
That’s no way to call your wife, harrharrr…!
What do you people need to happen until you believe me?!
It’s only a matter of time before someone gets themselves killed!
You need to ease off on the mead, Torwald!
*giggles*!
Harkharkhark...!
How do I reach these villagers...?
Hmm...
I don’t know what to say, Ashlyn...
Um, maybe he’s just lost track of time, surely?
Yeah… yeah that must be it…
You know how it is, man’s fishing, forgets himself y’know?
It’s not like him though.
He said he’d be back for lunch...
*Sniffle*!
What am I even supposed to do now...?
There, there Ashley, I'm here take care of you.
Jonathan's body mustn't be left to the elements.
I'll take care of that too...
Help an old fellow out, pale man?!
Always glad to see you around, pale man!
Feel free to hop on my cart, if you need a ride!
I'd rather be fishing.
Why do we even eat crabs?
Hello.
Where is that crab? Here not long ago...
I can't wait to get out of this village.
I hate the smell of the ocean.
The river blesses us with so much food.
Ever had crab rangoon?
I'd rather fish with a spear anyday.
Fishing is a great way to make a living.
Great fishing weather we're having!
At least the fish can't pinch you.
I'm so sick of fish and crab.
Why has the price of bread gone up?
I need a break from gutting fish.
Why couldn't I have born into a family of bakers?
Now where did I put my bait?
Good bait is hard to come by.
Always wanted to be a harvester of the sea.
I'll live and die a fisherman.
I've always found peace in fishing.
I just want to fish before my days are done.
Ugh. Crab, again?
What is your favorite fish?
Goopy tastes horrid.
Charcoal snapper, now those are some good fish.
These are the best pants I've ever owned.
Oh no, what did I step in?
Fair weather today.
*cough cough*

aggrobarks.bark: Arrr you lookin' to die, matey?!
I'll feed yerrr bones to the vultures, arr!!
Ever faced a man who hath no mercy, harr?!

barks.bark: Fresh fish! Get your fresh fish here!
We have some fishing supplies if interested.
Finally some peace an' quiet.
Aye.
Nice day for it, innit?
Did we come here to talk, or did we come here to drink...?
But this is your home...! Will you not defend it?!
Err, it's not that we lack the will, ma'am...
Is just that we're farmers, not warriors.
'Sides, we ain't got weapons!
Are we to fend off bandits with pitchforks in hand?
Yet fight them we must, somehow.
You've all seen what they done to Baronsgreene.
Do not think our fate would be any different!
Aye, right you are, sir...
Aye...
Aye...
I think I twisted my ankle...
I might have to take few days off from farm work...
That was a glorious battle! Hooray for our success!
Hooray! Hooray! Hooray!
Is this my blood?
Oh, it's not my blood...
It... tastes funny...
I... I think I need to...
Shouldn't we be out there fighting?
Nah...
Somebody's gotta watch over the camp, right?
I never knew there was something of a soldier in you, darling...
No, me neither...
You both need to do as I say now.
I have my sword, I’m ready to fight!
Jacob, you’re eight – you’re not fighting anyone.
If any of the bad men make it here you need to run away and hide, understand?
Why are you bossing us around anyway?
Because dad said so, and I'm your elder!
You’re just always trying to be so bossy!
This isn’t a game, Ames!
Our lives really are in danger, and I need to make sure nothing happens to you two!
By some miracle, dad says we're safe now...
But you should still listen to what I say.
Hah, I knew it!
You were just looking for an excuse to be bossy!
Stop it Ames, I was concerned for your lives!
The bad men are gone? But I didn't even get to fight any of them...
How many times must I say, Jacob...
No, I forbid you!
Your place is right here, with us!
And what man would I be if I cowered here, instead of protecting our home?!
You're not a soldier, Freddy!
Look at you - you don't even have an armor to protect you!
But what choice do I have?! I must fight!
*grumbling and mumbling*!
I may be old, but my head works fine and I still hear things around here.
You gotta tell folk outside, they gotta fight no matter what.
So the boy did it...?
I... I never should've doubted him...
Just... promise to be careful out there!
Nothing will happen to me, I promise.
We're all gonna be alright.
Freddy, you're bleeding?!
Just a scratch, really, uh...
Gotta say, that arrow would've been the end of me if not for the armor...
Oh, Freddy...!
So... daddy isn't coming back...?
*sob*
No dear, just the two of us now...
Oh Freddy... you brave, brave fool...!
Over here!
Good luck, pale friend!
My men await me on the battlefield, I'll be counting on you, friend.
I don't understand...
What manner of beast did this...?
You don't think... maybe the old man Torwald could be right?
Um, no... no... can't be...
I feel safer already.
I feel manlier, somehow.
Yeh, it does make a lad feel powerful holding a sword, doesn't it...?
Tread carefully, here in merciless nature.
You are welcome to warm yourself by my fires.
I can tell you're eager, young Thomas - motivated.
But Guard Boderick tells me you're just not ready.
Don't take it as a personal slight, it's really not.
We can't afford to waste a promising good man like yourself.

aggrobarks.bark: A little fishy, here? Come get gutted!

npc.name: Chotter
npc.comment: bandit leader, large body builder type, male

barks.bark: Are you the one who helped take down those bandits? Your name precedes you.
You have my deepest thanks, friend.
Hey there, traveler. What brings you to this open quarry?
Looking to dig in and get your hands dirty? I've got a spare pickaxe in the cart if you're up for it.
It all just happened so fast...
But you mustn't dwell on it, Phillip.
However hard it may be, we must always find a way forward.
You hear, Errold? What a relief...
Our friends' spirits were able to move on.
Indeed. Now it is you who must learn to move on, Phillip.
Yeah, sure...
Dunno if I'll ever be able to set foot in a mine again, though.
You belittle us, but soon all will learn!
We are the world ender!
There will be no escape from our wrath!
Where did I put my magic wand...?

aggrobarks.bark: Can you not see my pain?!

npc.name: Concerned Citizen
npc.comment: If Opticus not saved this guy lets u know u need to save him okey

barks.bark: Where's Opticus gone this time...
Spare a coin...?

npc.name: Mayor Finchley
npc.comment: Q101 cave Mayor of Harshwind village

aggrobarks.bark: YOU IS NOT SOPPOSED TO BE HEER!!

barks.bark: But this can't be happening!
You two were meant to look after him!
Just... it happened so very fast!
Was all we could do to get away, miss.
But he's all I've left, he can't be gone!
We must get him back! You must help me!
I'm just not sure what you expect us to do, miss...
Remember to keep the peace while in our camp, traveler.
Don't go causing any trouble now, we have enough of it as it is.
Bandits got me cousin down at Baronsgreene, swore to fight 'em to the death then and there.
Don't go causing any trouble now, we have enough of it as it is.
You men all show promise - wouldn't be stationed here if it were otherwise.
But I reckon you're all still a bit soft around the edges!
That's why we're focusing on building a bit of character today.
... Jensen, back straight and eyes forward!
Aye, sir!
As I was saying...
We're going to get real comfortable wearing full battlegear.
Which means standing here nice and still as statues.
Ahem... for how long, sir?
Well however long it takes, Simon...
Till I'm satisfied with what I see when I look at you.
Woah, Thomas, you've been at that for quite a while now, haven't you?
You know the deputy-man thinks highly of you, right?
No need to prove yerself to anyone here, least of all to me.
Um, Thomas...?
You there...?

npc.name: Guard Boderick
npc.comment: Q85 sparring guard, HW west militia camp

aggrobarks.bark: Aight then, take me out if you can!

barks.bark: Fancy a drink?
Forest snail's meat is a real treat, you should try it some time.
Any news from the world, traveler?
Some of them wizards and druids sure seem to hate each other.
Don't got live music here as of yet, heard they do that in Grainwater...
Neighhhee-hawww...!
Trolls are getting pretty fearless as of late.
The sawmill ran all throughout the night. So hard to sleep...
I bet I can fell a tree faster than you.
Trees gotten taller lately, have you noticed?
Ahh, a great day to cut down some trees.
It ain't much, but it's honest work.
Always work to be done.
It ain't much, but it's honest work.
Good lumber is hard to find in this region.
Sometimes, I think the trees had it coming to them.
More hands make less work.
Pitter patter, let get at'er.
Not the safest place, what with all the trolls nearby.
My axe blade is a fixin' fer a replacement.
Wish we had access to more fish around here.
The general store never sells anything interesting, for some reason.
Tools have gotten more expensive.
I swear, anything that comes from Thornhill is cheap junk.
I wish the trolls would be our friends. I bet they can fell trees a lot faster than us.
Still a better place to call home than Thornhill.

npc.name: Gargawrogg the Big
npc.comment: Q101 at 13,15 prevents re-entry to mayor

barks.bark: Sir, sir! The Sallowstone Mine...!
They're talking about it at the funeral house right now!
Can't believe the mine's gone, just like that...
Can't be true, can it...?
Folk are muttering about ghosts, but that's just crazy... isn't it?
Been told to let y'all know, best stay away from Sallowstone for a while!
All perished, so he says - it's unthinkable...
But has anyone actually been to the mine, to verify?
I don't think they can, because of the... other thing...
You mean... it's true, what he says...?
My husband went to see.
Said he saw... things... from afar, and turned on his heels.
How can it be... I mean, really...?
*shrugs*

npc.name: Miner
npc.comment: random interact peasant, Ratcliffe tavern, male

npc.name: Miner
npc.comment: random interact peasant, Ratcliffe tavern, male

npc.name: Miner
npc.comment: random interact peasant, Ratcliffe tavern, male

npc.name: Miner
npc.comment: random interact peasant, Ratcliffe tavern, female

barks.bark: So... you guys been hauling in ore lately?
Mm...
Hrm.
More ale, anyone...?
...sure... sure, sure...
Sure does feel nice to sit down for a pint after a long day in the mines.
Mmm...hm...
'eard Richie was ambushed by goblins while working out in the woods...
Is true, I saw him, left him in a right state those little vermin.
And to think, that one druid lad told me the forest belongs as much to goblins as men!
He did now, did he? Nutter!
They go saying things like that, then wonder why we don't treat them kindly.
I don't care what any druid says, somebody ought to put a bounty on those goblins!
Is been talked about, me friends at the village council say is as good as done already.
Mean we're actually sending someone after those vile goblins?
Think so, yeah... just need to find the right man to take the job...
Think we should've done something, well I dunno... more?
Was a tough situation...
Maybe from a highground when you see them coming, but...
They were right on top of us, and they're so huge...
Yeah, for sure...
Good to see the mayor back safe and sound.
Definitely.
So, erm... been thinking about the next hunting trip?
Yeah, um... I'm not sure I'm ready to go back out there, Kale.
What'dya mean? You're not shaken about what happened, are you?
Look, everything turned out fine eventually! Haha!
We can have a beer and laugh about it now.
Yeah, whatever you say...
I just needed fresh air.
This place is a bit too rowdy for my liking.
My friends really recommended it, said countryfolk really know how to let loose.
They weren't lying!
Honestly I find it a bit banal.
I much prefer the sophisticated air of the Singing Sparrow.
But darling, we always go there...
And frankly, not all the clientele are so sophisticated.
I sometimes see criminals lounging about...
Remember that winter, Bran, when we tracked the white stag for days?
Ah, the elusive one...! Thought we'd never catch up, but then the snowfall revealed its trail.
Yes, and when we finally found it, standing majestic against the winter sun... I've never seen anything so beautiful.
Aye! It's hunts like those that make all the challenges worth it. Not for the trophy, but for the memories, y'know?
Days gone by... but those memories keep us warm in our old age, eh?
I mean, pirates though?! Here?!
Times sure are strange.
What cursed thing have we done to deserve to be targeted like this?
Wouldn't think too hard about it.
City's done well, just breeds envy is all.
Plenty of cities do well, this isn't normal!
Nah well, never said it was.
Where'd they come from, anyway?
River leads into the sea, would've had to sneak past Thornhill city though....
Ah yes, well that city's not what it used to be, no surprise there I guess.
Take care traveler, violent outlaws are about.
Moo... mooo!
Calm down, girl!
Mooo!
The land just shifted a bit, nothing to fear now.
Mooo…!
I know girl, I know…
Moo?
Why sure, girl, we'll go to the market tomorrow.
Moo!
It’s what my old nan used to say, though.
The day the land begins to tremble is a sign the sky is about to fall on you.
T’was only like one short tremor that happened...
The end times are near, what else could it mean?
Maybe a meteor slammed into the ground somewhere – could be anything, really.
Meteors falling… or is it the sky itself?
Ever been to the woods?
Hear a lot of wolves out there, so I keep my distance.
Stuff is real out here, unlike in the city.
Sometimes I’ve even seen a glimpse of one those druid folk through the trees.
Oh? Wonder what their homes look like.
Oh nah, they don't have homes!
They squat it out in the wilds, like some sort of beasts!
Oh my…!

npc.name: Edith
npc.comment: Prowler's Thicket F task giver II

npc.name: William
npc.comment: Prowler's Thicket M task giver III

npc.name: City Cat
npc.comment: Young city cat not used to hunt

barks.bark: Meow...
*Cat looks like she's hunting for rats*
*But at the same time unsure*
Growl! *Cat seems more sure to hunt rats now*
Meoooow *The cat looks hungry*
Purr Purr *The cat is looking happily at you*
Chop, chop, chop.
Great weather for loggin' today.
Cutting trees do do do do do.
Why did I give up being a merchant for this?
Ah, the simple life.
Aw shucks, my hatchet is getting rust on it.
I wish these blades held their edge longer.
I can't see the forest through all these trees...

npc.name: Rowan
npc.comment: troll village house next to wildsfir trees

barks.bark: Father, you're back!
I'm alive, if barely.
I heard they did terrible things to you, involving hay.
Yes, but I'm feeling much better now I'm here with you.
Guess we really ought to deal with those trolls somehow, eh Maicie?
I suppose, if you say so father...
I do, and come to think of it, I saw a massive troll the size of a boulder.
They called him 'THE BIG', something or other; they were very deferential of him, think he's a chief.
I see, but...
That's the kind of troll we can't have lurking around these woods, far more dangerous than the rest!
Yes father, but...
What? What is it Maicie, surely you agree?
Of course, it's just that...
Well, surely it doesn't have to be you personally?!
To fight the trolls? No, I suppose we could aim to hire someone...
You that worried about me then, Maicie?
Why, after your latest incident - yes!
Ehh, well... I suppose I'm old enough to stand back from this sort of excitement.

npc.name: Bardo the Forest Nomad
npc.comment: Cart fast travels around troll forest unlocked after Q101

barks.bark: Wouldn't wish to linger here for long...
Forest's calling.
Oh, hello there! Wasn't expecting visitors today.
Come on in. Mind the sawdust, it gets everywhere, I'm afraid.
The winter's been so long and harsh this year. It's taken a toll on everyone.
I've noticed. Seems like the village is quieter than usual. Fewer folks out and about.
The children are restless too. There's just not much to do during these cold days.
We need a change, something to lift the spirits of this village.
Agreed. But with our limited resources, it's hard to know where to start.
Oh, look at that! Isn't he the cutest pack mule you've ever seen?
Those big eyes! And look at those floppy ears! He's adorable.
Hee-haw!
Seems like he likes the attention.
Such a sweet creature!
These old bones... not what they used to be.
Remember when the village was bustling? Time's changed everything.
Could've danced all night back then, now it's a struggle to just walk to the square.
Hmph, everyone's in a hurry these days. No time for an old man's stories.
Maybe I'll rest a bit...
Ladies, lovely as always. How do you all manage in such a drab village?
Spare us the flattery, Roland. What do you want now?
If it's business, make it quick. We've got better things to do.
Always so cold. I'm just here to offer a deal, a way to brighten up this place.
We've heard your 'deals' before. Save your breath.
Just move along, Roland. Before you find yourself in deeper trouble.
Ah, a new face in the village. You're not from around here, are you?
The name's Roland. I've got connections, deals, opportunities. Whatever you might need.
Remember, if you ever need anything, just find me. Roland's the man to see.
You've got some fine quality lumber here. Looking to expand your business?
I've been considering it, but I've heard about your 'deals', Roland. Not interested.
Pity. I was thinking of a partnership. You provide the wood, I provide the clients. Think it over.
I’ll think about it, but my gut says no. My business, my rules.
Excuse me! This is a private residence. You shouldn't be here.
Please, leave immediately.
I caught these fish fresh from the river this morning. Want a taste?
If you're after today's catch, I promise you won't find any fresher than these.
I've got a variety of river fish here. Take your pick!
These are some of the best I've caught in a while. Perfect for tonight's dinner!
I pride myself on the understated elegance of my jewelry.
Each piece in my collection is simple, yet refined.
I've crafted each gem with care. Find one that resonates with you.
Adorn yourself with a touch of grace. My jewels are a labor of love.
Crafted with care, our weapons are reliable and true.
Seeking quality blades and armor? You're in the right place.
In need of a weapon? We offer a fine selection.
Our weapons have stood the test of time. Prepare yourself properly.
Sample the cuts of meat, as hearty as a knight's feast.
From robust steaks to satisfying roasts, we've got what you need for your meat cravings.
Our meats are quite delectable, you may find yourself returning for more.
Grill, braise, or simmer – our meats make for a hearty meal.
You've reached Ratcliffe. State your business and move along.
Another traveler, huh?
You there!
Help me!
... please?

npc.name: Farmer Annie
npc.comment: Fenwater Friend Achivement East Farmer Annie

npc.name: Farmer Robert
npc.comment: Fenwater Friend Achivement West Farmer Robert

barks.bark: *hic*... Glue's gotta be strong, right? Just... slap more on... it’ll stick eventually. I'm sure of it... probably.
Yeah, yeah! Glue’s like... magic! Just needs time... *wobbles*... just pour it... more! It’ll fix the wheel... somehow...
Uh... is it supposed to drip that much? I dunno... looks kinda... melty. But... maybe that’s how glue works?
Just gotta... let it set! Yeah! Setting! That’s the thing. We push... reeeal hard... it’ll stick. No problem!
*groans* Okay... pushing... I think it’s stickin’... wait, no... no it’s slipping again!
Wait! Maybe... we use more glue... yeah, that’ll do it! More glue... more sticking!
He said he’s gettin'... what was it? Nails? Huh. I mean... I dunno if that'll even work. Do people still use those?
Yeah, I heard about nails... old-fashioned, right? But maybe... maybe he knows somethin’ we don’t. What if he’s like... a genius carpenter or somethin’?
I mean... he sure seemed confident. What if he’s some kinda... expert? Like, way ahead of us. We’ve been using glue this whole time and... maybe he’s cracked the code!
*nods slowly* Could be... or maybe the old man just... has real steady hands, you know? Some people just... know stuff. Like... mysterious cart-building powers.
Yeah, yeah! He didn’t even hesitate! He knew what he was doin’. What if we’re the ones who’ve been wrong this whole time? *hic* What if glue’s not the answer?
Whoa... that’s deep, man. Maybe this whole thing is bigger than glue. Maybe... we’ve been holdin' carts back...
If this works... he’s either a genius... or we’ve been doin' this all wrong for years. *hic* Either way... I’m kinda excited to see what happens!
Whoa... it’s... it’s actually holdin' together! I can’t believe it... the cart’s not fallin’ apart! Nails really work?
Yeah... I mean... look at it! Solid as a rock. How did we not know about this? Nails, man... nails! Who woulda thought?
*scratches head* I feel kinda... dumb, honestly. We’ve been tryin' glue this whole time... and all it took was some nails. That old man... he knew somethin' we didn’t. Genius!
Yeah, he came in, slapped those nails in... like it was nothin’. We spent hours slatherin' glue everywhere, and he just... nailed it in like a pro.
I still can’t wrap my head around it... Maybe he’s built a thousand carts before... or maybe he’s just that good. Either way, I’m impressed. *hic*
Same... I mean, the cart’s perfect. We’d still be here covered in glue if it wasn’t for him. Guess... sometimes you just need someone to show you how it’s done.
I’ll admit it... nails are the way to go. But... y’know... I kinda miss the glue... It was a fun disaster. *hic*
*chuckles* Yeah... glue was... somethin’. But hey, at least now we’ve got a cart that actually works!

npc.name: Bartender Micko
npc.comment: Requests more beer to be delivered for bar

barks.bark: The villagers sure drink alot... We're running low on beer
Oh my, are the little brats afraid of you Harvy?!
Hahahahaa!
Come now, Harvy - there's no need for that!
Erm, I don't think he's listening to me.
The days we're living in, no fun allowed...
What's a witch like me to do...?
Harvy wasn't really even hurting anyone...
I guess the little one is kind of cute...
Everyone seems to like him better.
You're not the least bit scary, are you?
Hm, that's okay I guess...
PESTS... AROUND MY PUMPKINS...
EEP!
Oh my gosh...!
Yay, it drove away the evil pumpkin!
EEK!
Whoooa...!
That monster fight was awesome!
Aaah, don't let it catch you!
Careful with that monster, sir...!
Ugh, I actually liked the scary monster better.
Run away from the monster, run awayyy!
It's actually attacking...!
The little pumpkin head is sooo cute!
Agh, it threatened to eat meee!
Just like from granny's stories...!
Wheee, the pumpkin patch is freed!
Hiring that witch was a terrible mistake...
The pumpkin patch is looking better now, but where did that monster go?
Ah, everything is going swimmingly!
My festival will be remembered for years to come.

npc.name: Rovina Raventalon of the Hydrobor Circle
Aramis Artagne the Trairian Blademaster
npc.comment: halloween city, tournament fighter master duellist

npc.name: Rowdy Addams
npc.comment: halloween city, tournament fighter peasant, KOMBAT

npc.name: Rovina Raventalon of the Hydrobor Circle
npc.comment: halloween city, tournament fighter mage, KOMBAT

npc.name: Ser William Briskwater of Thornhill
npc.comment: halloween city, tournament fighter knight, KOMBAT

npc.name: Aramis Artagne the Trairian Blademaster
npc.comment: halloween city, tournament fighter master duellist, KOMBAT

barks.bark: Blimey, that meat from the vendor didn't sit right with me.
My stomach's been churning since we had it, darling.
I thought it tasted a bit off, but I was hungry, and the festival fare ain't the best.
Aye, the fish tasted a bit fishier than usual.
What's bothering you?
It's this sharp pain in my gut, - feels like a horde of angry badgers are fighting inside me.
Oh, Saints preserve us! I don't feel too good either.
We should've been more careful with our coin!
Maybe it's gone bad, or worse, it was bad to begin with.
You think we should see the village healer or the apothecary?
Maybe someone sells herbs at one of the stalls?
Perhaps, it would be cheaper anyways.
Aye, let us make haste, lest I turn any greener.
Not sure I can walk with how everything is spinning...

npc.name: Harvy o'Drear the Mad Harvest Golem

barks.bark: Purrr...!
Winning at the games? Claim unforgettable prizes here!
It's looking rather grim, isn't it Joffrey...?
Blast it, what kind of an idea was it to hire a raving witch anyway?!
Bring your unruly pumpkins to me!
I'll take care of 'em... hahaha...!
Squash thy enemies, master...
Crush their skulls! Make 'em scream!
Slay 'em, knights! Leave no survivors!
Rip 'em apart! Show no mercy!
Blood and fury! Let chaos consume them!
Tear 'em limb from limb! Let chaos reign!
Slash 'em to pieces! Bring on the pain!
Gut 'em, fighters! Let the carnage begin!
Crush 'em into dust! Unleash hell!
Slaughter 'em all! No survivors today!
Rend 'em apart! Make 'em beg for mercy!

npc.name: Sirka the Fortune Teller
npc.comment: harvest festival, used also in C174

barks.bark: Meats! Tasty meats!
Get the best festival meats here!
Hand crafted rings!
Beautiful rings, all hand made!
Hey, you! Show us your power, hit that high striker!
Step right up! Let's see if you've got the muscles!
Come on, be the hero we need! Smash that striker!
You look strong! Bet you can ring that bell!
Whoa! You've got this! Hit it to the sky!
Test your might! Ring that bell!
Go for it! Show that striker who's boss!
You're the one! Make that bell ring!
Oh yeah! Let's see some fireworks! Smash it!
Get over here and prove your strength! Hit it hard!
Archery! Archery this way!
Archery here! Archery! This way!
Ah, if only I was still young...

aggrobarks.bark: Insult the Warden of Greywall and suffer the consequences...!

npc.name: Spectral Marksman
npc.comment: GOG dungeon normal mobs, archer ghost

npc.name: Spectral Diviner
npc.comment: GOG dungeon normal mobs, mage ghost

npc.name: Mary Bloodwin, Sergeant of the Gatehouse
Gadrick Elm, the Steward of Thornhill

barks.bark: Sir, the owner of the Broken Cliff estate requests aid regarding the landslide...
And he shall have none.
That house was always at risk of falling into the river.
The fool should have fixed its foundation when he had the chance, now it's too late.
Yes, sir...
Sir, the Lord Mayor requested an update on his latest decree to raise the taxes...
Tell him whatever he wants to hear, the situation's underway...
Sir, he was adamant he see results by the end of the week.
Damn it, does he insist on triggering an open revolt...?!
Sir, what shall I...?
Just tell him he'll have his bloody gold!
Sir, there's a letter from the bank...
I'm aware.
Sir, we've defaulted on latest loan repayments...
I'm aware...
It seems they're sending an emissary to renegotiate, sir...
I said, I'm aware!
Glad to see you back down here, Lord Aercrest.
I trust your search was fruitful?
Comforting to see you down here Lord Aercrest, as always.
I've been eagerly anticipating your return, Lord Aercrest.

aggrobarks.bark: Riot - prisoners out of their cells!
Riot - prisoners out of their cells!

bestiarynotes.note: Casts powerful buffs on nearby allies, which trigger upon taking damage.

npc.name: Feron Argyle, the Blade of Resistance

barks.bark: So proud were we, to resist the Lord Mayor...
So proud, so full of conviction...
What is the worth of a noble cause...?
Was all the suffering worth it...?
Should have been better, fought harder...
Did not realize the price of failure...
Until it was too late...

combatbarks.bark: Sold out my friends, only to suffer a little less...
All men break eventually...
Regrets, so many regrets...
Hope... is pain... only pain...
They broke me, can you understand...?

deathbarks.bark: But my spirit died already, long ago...

aggrobarks.bark: Torture changes a man, did you know...?

bestiarynotes.note: Switches between melee attacks and throwing knives at range.

barks.bark: Harmless, little jokes about the Lord Mayor...
He didn’t like them, didn’t laugh one bit...
The circus was my home...
We were like a family, but he destroyed us...
What was I supposed to do...?
I had nothing left...
He took it all away from me...!

combatbarks.bark: We were a ‘freakshow’, the Lord said...
I showed them, I too could destroy...!
Everything burns...!
They took it all away from me...

deathbarks.bark: But in the end, the fires always burned out...

aggrobarks.bark: I wanted him to burn for what he did to me!

barks.bark: Nasty, nasty, nasty...
Such nasty comments about my food, why...
Every recipe, better than last...
But all I hear's nasty whispering...
Nasty, nasty, nasty...
Such nasty comments about my food, why...
Every recipe, better than last...
But all I hear's nasty whispering...
Secrets... so many secrets...
Why, I must have them all, I must know all their secrets!

aggrobarks.bark: Ah, shall we establish the truth, then?

combatbarks.bark: I like pain, you know...?
Do you like pain...?
Inflict all your punishment on me, I can take it!
I enjoy it...

aggrobarks.bark: One does not simply escape Greywall...

barks.bark: It's impossible to keep things clean around here!
I'm trying to keep the flame of civilization burning in this pigsty!
Least you people could do is not throw things on the floor!
I cannot stand things being so disorganized!
Why is everything so disorganized?! Why?!
How many times must I say not to put books on the wrong shelves!
Who's been putting books on the wrong shelves?!
Who was it?!
Usually, when one borrows a book, one also returns it once they're done reading it!
Missing books... how hard can it be?!
These are my books - my property! MINE!

combatbarks.bark: Nothing left, still cannot stop...
There can be no rest, never...
How far can one fall, in darkness...?

barks.bark: It's impossible to keep things clean around here!
I'm trying to keep the flame of civilization burning in this pigsty!
Least you people could do is not throw things on the floor!
I cannot stand things being so disorganized!
Why is everything so disorganized?! Why?!
How many times must I say not to put books on the wrong shelves!
Who's been putting books on the wrong shelves?!
Who was it?!
Usually, when one borrows a book, one also returns it once they're done reading it!
Missing books... how hard can it be?!
These are my books - my property! MINE!

aggrobarks.bark: When will you people learn to return your books?!

barks.bark: Hello there, dearie, don't be shy now!
Come closer and let Agathe have a look at you!
Think it's gonna happen, think the city'll soon descend to the Hells?
Well, have you been out to the streets?
Mood in the city ain't exactly cheerful, and listening to the Steward every day...?
If a revolt starts, Lord Mayor's likely wanting us to cut 'em down...
Most likely...
I mean... think you can do it?
All I know is I think I'll stick close to the Steward.
The Steward's man, then, eh?
Through and through.
And then I pulled me sword...
And that put an end to that...

aggrobarks.bark: And then I pulled me sword on him...

barks.bark: Chop 'em, burn 'em...
In the end they're all the same - dust...
Dust is worthless...

npc.name: Cain Asheart, the Cleric of Greywall

barks.bark: None may escape their penance!
Not even in death are your sins repaid!
You shall all suffer for eternity!

npc.name: Cain Asheart, the Cleric of Greywall

barks.bark: None may escape their penance!
Not even in death are your sins repaid!
You shall all suffer for eternity!

aggrobarks.bark: You shall die, but your pain will not end there!

barks.bark: An arrow to the neck!
It's no less than any of you deserve!
You lives mean less than nothing to me!
Tempt me, see what happens!
I'll put you down gladly!
Your meat can feed the dogs!

aggrobarks.bark: Prisoner in the loose, eh? I have just the thing for you!

barks.bark: Hungry, hungry dogs...
You boys are always so very hungry...
There'll be more prisoner flesh for you soon enough...

aggrobarks.bark: Dogs - your meal just walked in!

npc.name: Theodor Birch, Resistance Leader
npc.comment: prison resistance leader, ranged maybe because behind gates so cant be cheesed, greywall officers

barks.bark: Stand strong, men!
We can get through this!
All hope is not yet lost... not yet...!
Where's the light...
Why is there no light?!?!
I can't breathe!

aggrobarks.bark: It's all crashing down on me!

npc.name: Arthurus Brewer, Imprisoned Poison Master
npc.comment: give poison strike please, greywall officers

barks.bark: I was so close...
If they had just eaten it...
Can see it happening over and over...
Why wouldn't they eat it?!

aggrobarks.bark: Stay still, I need to test something on you...!

combatbarks.bark: I need to understand what went wrong...
Why didn't it work...?

npc.name: Rowan Spearwright, the Master of Arms

barks.bark: So many rusted blades...
I can't maintain all these rusty blades, I can't!

aggrobarks.bark: Not without my permission, you don't...!

npc.name: Drystan Grimward, the Fallen Gate Guard

barks.bark: People only coming in...
No one ever comes out...
Prison eats them alive...

aggrobarks.bark: NO, I can't let you enter, for your own good!

npc.name: Alyssa Stonepond, the Ghost of Greywall

barks.bark: Must... hoard more...!
LET THEM HAVE NOTHING!
MINE! I NEED MORE!
A newcomer...?
Good... very good...
Good for business...
Welcome home...
Shhhh, quiet you...!
She'll hear...!
Quietly... be still... be still... still...
...did you hear that...?
You... can free us...
Oi! Who's lookin' at me?!
*hic*... Ya think you can take me?!
I... *hic*... I ain't scared of no one!
What're ya gonna do 'bout it, huh?!
Bring me more ale... or else!
I don't get it...
... is it this way...?
Wehey, you did it!
I have a few coins to spare as thanks!
So, sheep... I guess I'll be looking after you from now on.
Don't you worry, you're in good hands!
I even read a book on shepherding!
Er... I'm not quite sure what to do now, though, I guess you'll kind of just stay there.
You look strong, sir.
Will you protect the bunnies, please?
Thin the number of hungry wolves... please?
Oh nooo, lookie who's back! It's my precious wittle packy-wacky muley-wuley!
I missed you soooo much, my sweet snuggly-wuggly mule! You're still the cutie-patootie with those big ol' twinkly eyes!
Brrrrhhh!
Who's the fluffiest muley ever? You are, you are!
I'm never letting you go again, my lil' muffin!
Laws don't reach here, but that don't mean there's no order.
Misbehave and you'll end up as food for the plants, no questions asked.
Whatever you do, don't get on the wrong side of the smuggler queen.
GRRR...!
You keep that bloody bear on a leash, alright?!
She will do no harm to anyone here...
...unless you give her a reason to...
It's your lucky day, fellas!
Got a fresh batch of the Sporepint special available!
My very own recipe, plenty to go around!
Erm... contain your excitement now, fellas.
No need to rush to the counter all at once.
May I tempt you with a mug of Sporepint's special, friend?
Course, got regular beer too, but you'd be missing out...
Heyyy you.
Keep yourself safe out there, this swamp can be a dangerous place!
My rooms are full, so find a bed elsewhere!
These days too many seeking shelter in this forsaken place...
Good for nothing smugglers and a druid...?
Soon as they run out of coin, I'll have 'em thrown out.
Think the goods are still okay...?
Yes, the bottles are well sealed, but that's not exactly the problem, is it?!
Where did you manage to find such a rotted barge anyway?!
The guy I bought it from assured the boat was fine, almost seaworthy called it...
Oh right, ''seaworthy'' alright...
You couldn't use your own eyes to determine that?!
Maybe if we could fish the goods out somehow...
Yes but we'll never get near it!
The sinking craft just happened to disturb the beast below the swamp!
Now there's no saying how long it will take for those tentacles to retreat back below surface...
Hrrrr...
Yes I agree, Arktosa, it disturbs me as well...
Nature here has systematically been distorted.
The creatures that inhabit this swamp are abominations.
Grrrrr...
But it's precisely why we are needed here.
I do not know what we can do to help, but we must at least try.
Nature's blessing's upon you, even in this place, friend.

npc.name: Shashtarnashk
npc.comment: lizard who spoke, swamp bootlegger village npcs

barks.bark: Ssseshhrrr...?
Ashashh shrashk hasarashhh...
Ahrrr rahsh shashternahk, sharash?
Hmm, friend... or foe...?
Heard about it in town, Lord-Mayor's offered a hefty bounty on boss's head...
Hah, ain't a surprise really.
Every day we smuggle more goods into the city, and we don't pay the poor lordling's tax.
Drawing this kind of attention though, makes me feel anxious...
Yeah well, boss ain't too worried, said t'was bound to happen.
Is it true what they say? Word is boss used to be close acquaintance to the Lord.
They have history, but she don't like talking about the details of it, so don't ask.
All I know is she used to work for him, but the lordling betrayed her, tried to have her killed.
Stabbed her in the back and ditched her into a moat, only they didn't make sure she died, she managed to crawl out.
I never knew!
And we we ain't gonna mention it again, like I said - boss don't like talking about it.

npc.name: Shady Rogue
npc.comment: tavern patron 1, swamp bootlegger village npcs

barks.bark: Should be an easy job, I've arranged the boat...
I've got the tools, and the rope...
Crossbows, shouldn't need 'em, but just in case...
That's right, we row into the city on a cloudy night...
Scale the walls and break into the aristocrat's estate...
Snatch the silverware, should be easy to find...
And disappear into the night, before anyone's the wiser...
Yeah... yeah... one thing though...
Yeah?
Is it just me, or does this beer taste funny?
Did you order the barman's special?
Um, yeah might've done, come to think of it...
Yeah, you're not supposed to order that.
Weird fellow, but ain't exactly others lining up to serve beer in this place.

npc.name: Shady Rogue
npc.comment: tavern patron 2, swamp bootlegger village npcs

npc.name: Shady Woman
npc.comment: tavern patron 3, swamp bootlegger village npcs

npc.name: Arkhan, the Exiled Warrior
npc.comment: hermit samurai, swamp bootlegger village npcs

barks.bark: We may share tea, that is if you have not come seeking to take my life.
It is refreshing to see the face of someone other than a thug in these lands.
Sometimes I miss fresh mountain air...

npc.name: J.E. Trevelyan, Headmaster of Thornhill Academy
Kathleen Collingwood, Master of the Woods
Arnold S.F. Ustinov, Master of Fishing
Gregory V. Mildert, Master of Mines
Ser Alan Castle, Master of the Forge
Lady Hildbede Saint, Master of Crafting

aggrobarks.bark: Food's here, get the cook pot ready!

combatbarks.bark: Fools, you messing with things you don't udnerstand!
I am the king, I even have the crown!
Wizard-man will kill you all!
You ruin things!

npc.name: Sasha Stonefort, the Mayor's Daughter
npc.comment: Q111 Sasha in armor at battle camp

barks.bark: I don't understand why you're forcing me into this stuffy leather tunic...
It's not like I will be joining you on the field of battle.
And this helmet... this strap is so uncomfortable, and it looks ridiculous besides!
You wanted to be here, so you wear that helmet!
There's no knowing what can happen when bloodshed begins.
That leather might make all the difference if a stray arrow flies this way.
And don't you forget about that blade in your hand, should a bandit slip by us and wander into our camp!
Yes, Zathe... I mean, sir!
Sasha, what is the meaning of this?!
Foolish brat! Have you any idea what you have done?!
Father, please, if you'd just...
No! You have gone too far this time!
Just look at yourself - what are you even wearing?!
What would your mother say?!
Father...
I fear you have been too lenient with the child, she developed illusions of heroism...
Oh, will you seize your treacherous tongue?!
No, Sasha, I'm afraid he is right.
You must be placed within house arrest, until Azzar and I find a way to salvage this situation.
Indeed, you really ought to learn that it will be our calm, wise heads who will solve this...
Not a rash youth like yourself!
You're lucky, I may still be able to find the right words to re-open negotiations.
Yes, it's time you put aside your arrogance and headstrong qualities.
You should instead attempt to learn from Azzar; he is an accomplished diplomat, I have full faith in him.
And perhaps the two of you should wait for word from the fortress, no?
I have full faith in my allies, they will soon bring word of the Bandit Lord's downfall!
Foolish, headstrong child...!
I have no idea where you get it from, certainly not from me...!
Sasha... my dear daughter...?
Yes, father?
Can we go home now...?
Yes, we'll go very soon, father.
Sasha... I...
Yes, father?
I don't like this place...
Yes, father, I know.
Do you... I, ermm... it's just that...
What is it, father?
Do you think it's possible that... well...
Have I been a bit of a fool?
Best not to think too much about that right now, father.
I'm sorry, Sasha...
There's a good chap!
I do hope you're the one they sent to assist me...

npc.name: Sergeant Almsworth
npc.comment: Q108 escort guard at Cannon Site

barks.bark: ...we just gotta lay low for a while, is all there is to it.
But in this place? C'mon, we gotta get back to the city.
It won't be so bad, I'm sure we can find a place to hide...
Not with the stunt you pulled, idiot!
Trying to steal from the Lord Mayor's tax collector?!
I swear, if you weren't my brother I'd have left you to their mercy!
How was I s'pposed to know he was, well... that?
Thought he was just some rich merchant.
With an entourage of city guards, a carriage with the city's crest on it?
Next time you get a harebrained idea, do nothing without asking me first!
How much longer must I wait for you old fossil to start producing some results?!
The Lord Mayor wanted this project done yesterday!
As you say, Captain...
The Lord Mayor will be most pleased...
He rewards those who reward him...
I will be rewarded...!
Heard Jason got grabbed by one of the lizards on his last run...
Him too, eh? Can't say I ever liked that grumpy blighter.
Shame though, ain't something I'd wish on my enemies.
Heard they found Elijah, body was completely drained by those insects...
Yeah? Shame, seemed like a decent lad that one.
Not reliable though, and never understood what it means to take care in this place.
BAHRRGH, YOU COOK HOOMAN WRONG AGAEN!
I HUNT HOOMAN RIGHT, I COOK HOOMAN RIGHT!
YOU BASH HOOMAN LIKE STOOPID, MAKE HARD TO COOK!
YOU BOTH SHUT UP, ARGUE LIKE STOOPID...
YOUR STOOPID WORDS MAKE MY HEAD HURT...
YOU ALWAYS THINK YOU SO SMART...!
YOU THINKS BECAUSE YOU MAGIC YOU SMART, IS NOT SO...
MAGIC ONLY COMES TO SMART, IS KNOWN...
SMART TROLL SHOULD LEAD ALL TROLL, SHOULD LISTEN TO ME...
NOBODY GONNA LISTEN TO YOUR STOOPID SPEAK!
NO STOOPID, WILL SHOW YOU ONE DAY...

npc.name: Restless Sorcerer
npc.comment: THCatacombs, uses gale, hits up to 21

barks.bark: Don't envy the old man, Captain will probably have his head when this thing falls flat.
Aye, whatever you do, just stay out of the Captain's sight.
He's a mean man, a harsh man, have heard stories...
Don't need stories to confirm that really, all he does is shout and scream.
And threaten with violence, acts on it too given reason.
Just stay out of his sight, out of his mind, yeah?
I'll be...
The buggers actually did it, built a cannon.
Aye, didn't think it was gonna happen.
Still best to stay out of the Captain's sight though, don't change that.
You reckon?
Absolutely, he'll want any excuse to test the new cannon now.
You better hope he doesn't turn it on you.
Those darn seagulls are making a mess of my roof again...
You got one of them! There's two more.
Yes! Last one!
Yeehaaw! That's all of them!

npc.name: Thornhill Elite Guard
npc.comment: Thornhill Tiding Achievement Fight Guard Agro

npc.name: Man
npc.comment: Thornhill Tiding Achievement Escort Guest Follower

barks.bark: Shoo! Shoo!
Help! They are attacking my sheep again...
Oi, hand me another ale, ya lazy sod!
Pffft, yer still on yer first! Finish that and maybe I’ll think 'bout it.
If ya can’t finish yer drink, don’t ask for more! We don’t serve quitters here!
I ain’t no quitter, Bart! Just warmin' up!
First drink and he's already wobblin’! Might as well serve him milk!
Hah! Milk's more than he can handle, if ya ask me.
Milk!? I’ll show ya who’s weak, just bring me another ale!
Bart, better bring him a cushion, he’ll be under the table by sunset!
Last time he passed out, he knocked over three chairs. Keep an eye on him!
Oi, both of ya shut it! I can outdrink the lot of ya with me eyes closed!
Alright then, big guy. Let’s see it. But if ya spill a drop, you're cleanin' it up!

npc.name: Lord Blackshield
npc.comment: bandito fort, Ratorz Kharkazar, Razshaskovian lol

combatbarks.bark: I've crushed bigger things than you!
No one can stand against Lord Blackshield and live!
How fares your skull, after I bring my board down upon it?!
Vermin, filthy vermin the whole lot of you!
You should know, I have powerful friends...
You're not supposed to be here, little rats!

deathbarks.bark: But this was not... supposed to be my fate...

barks.bark: Bring their leaders to me!
Lord Blackshield will see their heads!
Any that gets near me, I'll cleave them in half!

combatbarks.bark: You made a mistake walking in here!
I will make you more dead than you can imagine!
I am Lord Blackshield's favorite, I will not fail him!
My blade can split logs, it'll have no trouble splitting you!
When I'm done with you, they won't find your limbs!

deathbarks.bark: Lord Blackshield... won't let you get away with this...

aggrobarks.bark: Your head will make a fine trophy!

barks.bark: Whoever's behind this, I'll bleed them - slowly!
Hang these intruders from their legs, so I may slit their throats!
Lord Blackshield won't be satisfied...
...until he sees these floorboards soaked with the blood of his enemies!
*SHRILL SCREACHING* !!!
Ahhahahaha, screaming always makes a girl feel better!

combatbarks.bark: Don't you think I'm pretty?
This dress wasn't always red, you know?
You wanna dance, sweetie?
You're starting to make me ANGRY!
You remind me of my husband, wanna know what I did to him?

deathbarks.bark: What have you done?! You ruined my dressss...!

aggrobarks.bark: Ahh, so many places I could cut you!

barks.bark: KILL THEM, MAIM THEM, SLAY THEM !!!
MAKE THEM SCREAM !!!
I WANNA HEAR THEM SCREAAAAM !!!
...yes, yes, yes, YES, YESSS...!
BLOOOOOODDD!!!
Bring any who stay alive to meeee!
I WILL SAW THROUGH THEIR BONESSSAHHH !!!

combatbarks.bark: ...die, die, die, DIE, DIE DIEEEE... !!!
Give me your blood, go on, GIVE ITTT!
You're a feisty one, yeah?!
Where's your blood, are you even alive?!?!
I'm not CRAZY, I'M REALLY NOTTT !!!

barks.bark: You fool brutes, use tactics against them, would you?!
Trap them, poison them, throw bombs on them...!
Don't even give them a chance!
Where are the explosives when you need them?!
Whoever dies from this, I'll make sure it won't be me...

combatbarks.bark: Do not delude yourself, you're no match for me!
I've survived far worse than this!
You couldn't just let us raid in peace, could you?!
Now for a little trick...
Well, you won't survive this...

aggrobarks.bark: And before you know it, you're already dead!
We've got visitors! Like what I've done with the place?
Lost puppy wandering in the woods, your skin will make for a nice pelt!

npc.name: Sly Jonne
npc.comment: sasha Q110, Prison Breakout Guy, IN PRISON

barks.bark: Hey there, you!
There's been a dreadful misunderstanding!
I'm really not supposed to be here!
That's it!
Now we can sneak out through the sewers!
Fresh air, finally!
You look surprisingly good, Jonne...
Aye, would've thought jail time'd left you withered.
Me, withered?! Can't imagine!
Come now, I wasn't locked up for that long.
Besides, they gave me better food than I sometimes had as a free man.
Huh, if that's so, wouldn't mind the Marshal locking me up sometimes...
Feels kind of strange, this...
Fellas, is it just me, or are we for once doing honest work?
Not sure I'd call killing all that honest, though we are on the right side, I think.
Honest, dishonest, all the same to me s'long as we're getting paid.
You *did* say we're getting paid, right?
Yes, yes, Zathe's an honest man...
And the good thing about honest men is that you can count on them paying.
Just... make sure you get out of this alive, it's harder to get paid if don't...
I do think an apology would be appropriate, after all this time...
You deserved to be locked up and you know it.
How can you be so callous? Here I thought we were friends.
And let's not pretend you aren't here only out of self-interest.
Well, if you continue to be so rude, I might just leave.
Ugh, will you two stop bickering?
There are much more important things to discuss!
Your voice is like sweet honey, my dear...
Oh, you cannot but compel me to obey.
Please, honeyed words won't win my sympathies.
But of course, my esteemed lady, whatever you say...
So you're really doing this, moving against the Bandit Lord?
No, *we* are doing this, you're as much part of this now.
And I thought you were meant to seek out old friends to join us?
Errr, right, of course, well...
Last I heard, Slick Eddie was trading in Ratcliffe...
Absolutely not, we're not involving 'Slick Eddie'!
Well excuse me your Lordship!
All of a sudden my friends are not good enough for you?
That's right, I'd rather fight alongside an ogre than that swindler.
Okay, we can do without Slick Eddie.
Surely he's not your only acquaintance?
Ah, fine, I suppose Eddie's a bit unreliable at that.
Hmm, let me think...

npc.name: Azzar Kheyn, the Renegade Wizard
npc.comment: kombat kheyn, ogre dungeon3 kreogu fight phase 1

combatbarks.bark: I learned from the greatest Vhosphoran mage...
You cannot hope to match me!
Once I'm done with you, I will destroy Haywind.
You're trying my patience...

npc.name: Aragruull, the Ogre Commander
npc.comment: used in assault quest, guarding trollhammaren

barks.bark: BRING THEIR SKULLS TO ME, WILL MAKE THEM INTO NICE PILE!
WHY ARE HUMANS STILL ALIVE?!
KILL THEM FASTER!
Big nasty troll made my hammer...
Look forward to bashing through human's wall with it, harr harr!
FAT, LAZY WARRIORS!
BREAK THEM HUMANS NOW, OR I BREAK YOU!

combatbarks.bark: Will turn you into mush, human!
Stupid human challenge Aragruull, hah!
Humans are weak, and you're human!
Human will die under ogre's foot!
Your flesh stink, human, but will eat you anyway!

aggrobarks.bark: Gonna crack your bones in all the places, GRAWR!

barks.bark: They're hitting us hard, sir!
Yes I can see that, Scoutsman!

npc.name: Master Scoutsman
npc.comment: q112 bg cinematic, sekret mission squad leader

barks.bark: Go on now, sir!
Mount the glider, sir!
We did it, we won!
For a moment there things seemed very bleak!
Indeed, but some hero took down the ogre commander!
Couldn't have done it without them.

aggrobarks.bark: Look over there lads - time for murder!

combatbarks.bark: YOU MAKING RUCKUS IN MY FORTRESS?!
RAAARRRGH !!!
RAAAAAAGE !!!
FURYYYY...!
DEAAATH !!!

barks.bark: Good to stand side by side with you once more, Ernsthart.
Indeed, it's been too long, Rieler, too long...
No one else I'd rather fight, or die alongside with.
We're finally driving back the bandit scum, about time.
For too long things were at a standstill, but an adventurer came along...
Helped me bring about some justice for the ruined village west.
Indeed? My luck was similar, an adventurer fought pirate gangs to the east on my behalf.
Is that so? Interesting...
You've been in plenty of fights, what do you make of our chances?
The bandit numbers are many, but Zathe is about the best leader we could have.
The man has seen more warfare than any in Haywind ever did, I trust his judgement.

npc.name: Marzin Stonefort, the Mayor of Haywind

barks.bark: Welcome, welcome...
I've been expecting you.
Ah, there you are!
A cozy little camp, isn't it?
Shame we can't stay for long.
Once more, we're very grateful for your help, Srharn.
It would have been easy for you to refuse us.
Hrm... In my culture, one saves your life, they are owed a debt...
Only most dishonorable man does not pay his debt!
They are branded coward and do well not to show their face ever again.
Unless they wish to do away with their life...
Even so, I'm sure Kheyn's followers have no trouble with treachery and cowardice.
Thus it is well you are here to end their lives, I approve.
You won't keep me out of this, Zathe.
You'll need my help, and this is as much a mage matter besides!
That much is apparent from the letter, unless you forgot?
Of course not, but aren't you a little... inexperienced, Brianna?
It seems Azzar is a more dangerous opponent than we had anticipated.
Perhaps this need not be your fight, perhaps the Academy could send someone... older?
No, Master Traberius entrusted this mission to me and I intend to see it through!
Did I not prove myself in Blackshield's Fortress?
Hmm, I suppose, though I worry...
You should not be so concerned with 'proving yourself' to anyone, young mage.

combatbarks.bark: PUNY HUMAN, COME TO DIE !!!
WILL DESTROY YOU...!
SWAT YOU LIKE A LITTLE FLY...!
SEND YOU BACK IN PIECES...!
TEAR OFF EVERY LIMB...!
SPILL YOUR BLOOD ON THESE ROCKS...!

barks.bark: You have my thanks...!
There are words I'd offer you...
Why haven't we done this before, Sarge?
Pure lack of imagination, Crawford!
Nice for you to loosen up for once, eh?
Shut up and drink your beer!
That's an order, bwahahaha!
By ancestors, it's dark down here!
Will you please light a torch?!
I hear the squeaking of rats...
I hate rats...

npc.name: Deputy Charlesworth
npc.comment: River Pirate Deputy replacement in Q111

barks.bark: Tuck that shirt in, or something...!
Carry on then, new guy...
I know my rights!
Shut it...!
I deserve justice!
You're where you belong and you know it!
I want...
I want to send my letter!
You can send as many as you'd like.
You're a sick oppressor, you know that?!
And you...!
Done listening to your yapping!
How dare you?!
Don't you know who I am?!
*takes a gulp of beer*
That's... that's not allowed!
Well, don't we gotta be like alert or something?
Why? Nothing's ever gonna happen.
Well, what if like prisoners start escaping, or rioting?
Nah, they won't.
It's fine, everything's fine.
We aren't really even needed here.
How about you share some of that beer?
C'mon now, we're all friends here.
Guys...?

barks.bark: Oi, Sergeant! Ain’t there no jobs left? We’re dyin’ out here!
Yeah, give us somethin’! Just nothin’ too tough, eh?
Can’t you find us somethin’ where we don’t gotta move too much?
I could haul stuff... if it ain’t too heavy... *yawn*
Work? You lot? You wouldn’t know hard work if it bit ya!
Hey, we ain’t lazy, just savin’ our strength... for when the real work shows up!
Yeah, we could do plenty... if you had anythin' worth our time!
Like sleepin’ on the job? That’s all you're good for!
C’mon, Sergeant, toss us somethin’ light. We ain’t askin’ much...
I got no one willin’ to do a decent day's work around here! Get movin’ or get out!
Aaahh!
Go away, shoo!

barks.bark: Very kind of you to surface after all these decades, Azzar.
Spare me...
You'd disappeared for such a long time, we'd almost forgotten about you.
Even I, who fought against you in the Sorcerer's War, all those years ago...
A shame I didn't end you back then!
Yes, I suppose you'd think so...
Though in part the role I have today is because so many of my peers were indeed ended by your war.
It will bring great satisfaction to see you finally face justice!

barks.bark: All goods of value must be declared to me!
Payment for trade permits is due by sundown!
Late comers will face extra fees, naturally...
Disorder in this station is not tolerated!
If you weren't able to afford my import fees on your goods...
Then move them out of my sight post-haste!
Any disputes you have about fines and fees you may face...!
You may leave them with the appropriate authority.
Which is me! I'll be sure to give them the proper consideration they deserve.
Hahahaha!

npc.comment: Thornhill trade station, bg npc, merchant 1

barks.bark: The lord of these lands levies heavy tolls...
Indeed, and the master of this trade station demands his fair share as well.
How is a man to trade under such burdens?
Forces honest traders like us into difficult choices.
If this continues, I can't see traders coming into Thornhill anymore.
True, but from what I've heard, I doubt anyone can make the Lord listen to reason.
I'll say, the roads have grown more perilous with each passing day.
A merchant’s journey has never felt so fraught with danger...
You'd be right, bandits seem to lie in wait around every corner.
Not to mention the beasts stalking the forest roads.
So where are the patrols that are so sorely needed?!
I've traded between Thornhill and Melloria all my life, but...
I just don't know if I can keep it up anymore.
Hm, might try finding new trade further south.

Gordon Hatchet

barks.bark: The goblins, ma’am - the Frostfang Tribe...
Yes, Gordon, I’ve heard...
The goblins have always been troublesome, but can't you take a rest, enjoy the festival?
Yes, but ma’am... somehow they’ve become exceptionally vile. We’re attacked constantly!
And when we do get away with our lives, they poach our belongings!
We must take the sword to them, drive them back!
But we can’t leave the village defenseless, Gordon-dear.
Well someone must do it, something has to be done!
It can’t go on like this...

npc.name: Henrik Fjord, the Mayor of Grainwater

barks.bark: Come now, man! Please, get up!
Yoush... hwhat... mate...?
This is an embarrasment! Get up right this instant!
Hhhh...
Hic!
Argh, what am I to do with you lot?!
Will you finally get off the street, this is ridiculous!
Don't talk so loud, head's pounding...
Must I get you another cold shower?!
Relax, Mayor, I'm just resting a bit...
You should get some rest too, you sound stressed...
You say this is fresh...?
Seems like yesterday’s catch to me.
That is truly some smell...
Stock full of wild goopy again, what a shocking surprise...
What is it with you, lady?!
Are you actually going to buy something, or are you just here to run your mouth?!
Oh, no, no... I'm just browsing, thank you.
Any word if Barnsy's whiskey's coming back to stock soon?
Why would I know? Wait...
You actually drink that swill?!
Well, I mean... yeah, why not?
What is wrong with you, man?!
Just head to the tavern and ask Amelia to pour you a fresh pint of beer!
Well, Amelia's brew's alright, but...
Barnsy's liquor just hits something different, you know?
No, I really don't know...
Down, down, down, by the river...!
Hum, hum, hummm...
...take my hand, and hold it tight...
...night is young, we're going down, down, down...
Hum, hum, hum...
Humm, humm...
...don't wake me up, just leave me there dreaming...

npc.comment: For testing on puppet playground scene

combatbarks.bark: You won't win, Kheyn!
What's taking Brianna so long?!
Why is the bad guy always a wizard...?
I always knew there was something rotten about you!

barks.bark: I'll need a little more time...!
Please subdue Azzar while I summon the Hydrobor Circle!
We did it!
*You* did it, you killed that terrible beast!
I can't thank you enough!
If you'd try to stay still, sir...
We'll do our best to help you.
Urghhh...!
Yes, I see that...
Here, this should help.
Aghhh...!
Indeed, but you'll live.
Bloody beast... never again...
Ohhh, come here little kitty!
*Purrs softly*
So soft and so... fluffy! Yes you are!
*Purrs louder*
Don't tell anyone - it's a secret - but I have a bit of chicken for you!
*Purrs happily, rubs against her*
Such a pretty kitty! Oh, go on then, you must leave me to my duties!
Purrrmeow!

npc.name: Maid
npc.comment: prologue responsible drinker maid in c254

aggrobarks.bark: These goodies belong to us, you better back off!

barks.bark: Ah, I cannot wait for tonight’s banquet! They say the feast will be the finest in years.
Indeed, Sir Reginald! I’ve heard whispers that the roast pheasant will be unmatched, and the spiced wine... I can already imagine the taste!
I wouldn’t be surprised if the cook is some sort of magician. The way they conjure such flavors is beyond belief.
Or a poet, weaving flavors as verses, creating a masterpiece with each dish, hahaha!
Lord Aercrest has a good eye for tapestries, don't you agree?
I do not think the Lord has the eye for it, but his wife.
In any case, makes one wonder how many years it took to weave such intricate scenes.
Have you heard the commotion downstairs? Some of the Great Estates are at each other's throats.
Oh yes, it’s been growing louder by the minute. I fear it may escalate to blows soon.
I suppose Lord Aercrest must intervene, I can't imagine he's pleased.
Ah, he's used to it. Someone's always causing a scene at these gatherings.
Be that as it may, I'm keeping my dagger close. Better to be cautious than regretful later.
What a magnificent garden! It's hard to believe we’re still within castle walls.
I know, it's like we've stepped into another world, like in one of those exciting books, you know?
I had no idea roses could even look so stunning!
And the fragrance... This garden is truly a work of art!
I don't even care about the banquet anymore, I feel like I could just stay here for the rest of it...
You see, my dear girl... The energies that flow through this room are absolutely fascinating!
The streams of magic attracted by the artifacts are perfectly aligned for a grand thaumaturgical experiment!
Oh, um, that sounds... very interesting, sir. Thauma-what now?
Thaumaturgy, my dear girl! If I were to harness all this energy, I could... well, I could...
Hmm, I could even summon a spectral illusion of this entire castle!
Imagine that, an entire castle hovering in the air!
That’s... quite something, sir. I’m sure it would be lovely...
Lovely? My dear girl, it would be a spectacle of grandeur!
Reality itself bending to the will of magic! Can you even fathom it - the brilliance, the power?!
Of course, sir, erm... Shall I bring you some tea while you... think about that?

npc.name: Wilfred the Valet
npc.comment: prologue manor, special, gives clothes in c261

barks.bark: The roast pheasant should be golden and crisp, not a second overdone. Understood?
Yes, Chef! I’ll keep a close eye on it.
And the sauce for the venison, Chef? Should I start reducing it now?
Yes! It needs to be rich and velvety. No lumps, no burning. Stir it constantly and keep the heat steady. There's no room for mistakes tonight!
What about the bread, Chef? Is it ready for the oven?
Yes, but you must time it with the rest! It needs to come out just as we’re plating the main course. Fresh and hot, no excuses!
Understood, Chef, timing is key, Chef!

Your kind is not for this place for long, *snicker*!

barks.bark: Come closer now, don't be shy!
Feast your eyes on the finest, festive curios you've ever seen!
These are... fascinating. Do people actually buy these?
Oh, absolutely! They're incredibly wanted, and rare!
I have to admit, they're quite unique. What's the story behind this one?
Ah, now *that* is just a masterpiece of creativity and cheer! Truly a sight to behold, isn't it?
Hmm, it's certainly... unconventional. Perfect for someone with an eccentric taste, I suppose.
Precisely! And who doesn't wish to be eccentric and bold, when you think of it?

barks.bark: Ice sculpting!
You are in grave danger...
Vendor, you are in grave danger!
What? Danger? From what?
A dark force looms over you. You must act quickly.
What do I need to do?
Retrieve old jewelry from the cemetery crypt for a ritual.
The crypt? That sounds dangerous!
It is, but it’s the only way to save yourself.
Blacksmith, the spirits have spoken. You are in danger!
Danger? What are you talking about, Fortune Teller?
A curse lingers around your forge. You must act quickly.
What do I need to do to stop it?
Find three shards of enchanted metal buried in the old ruins.
The ruins? That’s no easy task.
It is the only way to lift the curse and save yourself.

combatbarks.bark: WAIT, THERE'S TWO OF YOU?! OR I SEE DOUBLE...?
GRRAARGH... WHY DON'T YOU STAND STILL?!
HRRR, WHY... THE FLOOR'S NOT STRAIGHT?!
URGH... WHOEVER MAKE THE ROOM SPIN, NEEDS TO STOP!!
SLOW DOWN, BUG, SO I HIT YOU!!
YOU... NOT FIGHT FAIR, HUMAN!!

deathbarks.bark: URGHF... MAYBE DRINKING SPOILED MEAD WAS BAD IDEA...

barks.bark: What a mess...
My dear old castle, your treatment these past years has been nothing short of barbaric.
Yet still you stand, and I'm here to fix you now, at long last.

FEELING SCARED YET, BUG?!
MY... AXE... HUNGERS!!
TOO SLOW, TOO WEAK, TOO... BUG!
AFTER I BREAK YOU, I TAKE BACK MY THRONE!!

deathbarks.bark: But I... was meant to live forever...?
